tool.name: Gene Copy Number Finder
tool.description: from a genetree using the ETE Toolkit

param.name: genetreeFile
param.label: GeneTree file
param.help: GeneTree in nhx format, where nodes are in form of geneid_species

tool.help:
Find copy number for genes from GeneTree by utilising the `ETE Toolkit`_. Input can be single GeneTree or multiple GeneTree in a file with one GeneTree per line.
.. _ETE Toolkit: http://etetoolkit.org/
